name: It's a Beautiful Day
description:
Take care of yourself before going out. It's going to be a wonderful day today.

--

This my first solo twine game !
Made in about a week on & off.
Started off for the YOUjam but I didn't make it in time...
So it got revamped and rewritten for the SelfCare Jam
which is honestly one of the best themes I jammed on.


backgrounds were made using https://roomstyler.com/
music was made with the Korg Gadget app

edit: I have just seen that at least 1 person found the music very loud
I do not know how to make it optional or have a volume controller, so I am very sorry if this happens to you, and if you know of a way to control audio in Twine please reach out !
